mapper.select: SELECT BO.no, BO.title, BO.content, US.name, BO.hit, TO_CHAR(BO.reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI') reg_date, US.no userNo FROM board BO, users US WHERE BO.user_no = US.no order by BO.no desc
SELECT b.no, b.title, b.content, b.hit, TO_CHAR(b.reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI') reg_date, b.user_no userNo, u.name from board b, users u where b.user_no = u.no and b.no = #{no}
